member.name: IMFFieldOfUseMFTUnlock.Unlock
member.summary: Unlocks a Media Foundation transform (MFT) so that the application can use it.
member.param: A pointer to the IUnknown interface of the MFT.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFFieldOfUseMFTUnlock
member.summary: Enables an application to use a Media Foundation transform (MFT) that has restrictions on its use.
